data.comment: Gavin Ward starts the match. Bournemouth with the kick-off in Bournemouth.
Goal! Jack Stacey gives Bournemouth a 1-0 lead in Bournemouth.
In the minute 42, Goal! Blackburn go level at 1-1 through Bradley Johnson in Bournemouth.
The first-half has come to a close in Bournemouth.
Blackburn have kicked-off the second half at Vitality Stadium.
In the minute 48, Lewis Cook for Bournemouth has been booked by Gavin Ward and receives a first yellow card.
Jefferson Lerma (Bournemouth) has received a first yellow card.
Jefferson Lerma scores to make it 2-1 at Vitality Stadium.
In the minute 59, Jason Tindall is making the team's first substitution at Vitality Stadium with Dan Gosling replacing Jefferson Lerma.
The away team have replaced Joe Rankin Costello with Joe Rothwell. This is the first substitution made today by Tony Mowbray.
Tyrhys Dolan is replacing Ben Brereton for the away team.
In the minute 73, Adam Armstrong gets an equalizer for Blackburn. The score is now 2-2.
David Brooks is replacing Chris Mepham for Bournemouth at Vitality Stadium.
Arnaut Danjuma is on target to give Bournemouth a 3-2 advantage.
In the minute 84, Jason Tindall (Bournemouth) is making a third substitution, with Philip Billing replacing Junior Stanislas.
Tony Mowbray is making the team's third substitution at Vitality Stadium with Corry Evans replacing Lewis Travis.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-2.
